name: WarriorStruggle
description:
A simple platform game, with grim atmosphere and challenging- but very rewarding- character control system. Don't fall into lava, and look out for those shooters!

Playable levels:
-tutorial, a map created to teach you how to play
-7 classic levels where your objective is to reach to the end
-siege level, where your objective is to survive enemy attack
-battle level, where your objective is to survive on a battlefield
-deathroom level, where you are thrown into a map where enemies spawn constantly
-invasion level, where enemies spawn endlessly

Playable classes: 23 diverse characters, wielding swords, axes, bows, guns or spells, and more

Difficulty settings: several levels,  if you want it easier or maybe if you are a masochist

Bots: AI making enemies actual challange

Multiplayer: A simple arena, where you can face your friends in local game. All hero characters are aviable, except for: Bowman, Ice Queen and Necromant.

Cosmetics: You are capable of choosing how your character looks! Several heads and bodies to choose from.

If you want, you can visit a blog for this game here
